data.prayer: Spirit, train the church of Fiorentino, San Marino to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Fiorentino, San Marino
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, put the people who are lonely into families in the state of Fiorentino.
data.verse: God sets the lonely in families. He brings out the prisoners with singing, but the rebellious dwell in a sun-scorched land.

data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Fiorentino, San Marino into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Fiorentino
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 2 believers in the state of Fiorentino.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, multiply brothers, sisters, and mothers to our spiritual family in Fiorentino, San Marino.
data.verse: He replied to him, “Who is my mother, and who are my brothers?” Pointing to his disciples, he said, “Here are my mother and my brothers. For whoever does the will of my Father in heaven is my brother and sister and mother.”

data.prayer: Spirit, renew the call of John the Baptist in the state of Fiorentino. Send out bold servants who will call all to repent.
data.verse: Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
